import React from "react"; import "./sideNavbar.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Sidenaavbar({setValue}) { const [activeLink, setActiveLink] = useState(""); const handleLinkClick = (linkName) => { setActiveLink(linkName); }; return (
